item.title: This not been fixed yet, 8th August
item.description:
Urgent Request for Litter Cleanup in Densole and King Hall Road Area Reported via desktop in the Litter and Detritus category anonymously at 08:17, Thursday 24 July 2025 Sent to Bromley Council less than a minute later. FixMyStreet ref: 7924859. I am writing to raise a concern about the ongoing litter problem in the Densole and King Hall Road area. The streets have not been cleaned for over seven weeks, and the accumulation of rubbish has now become a serious health and environmental issue for residents and passers-by. As a local resident, I kindly request that the council take immediate action to organise a thorough sweep and cleanup of the area. The current state of the streets is not only unsightly but also poses risks to public health and safety. I would also appreciate it if the relevant management teams could review the current street cleaning schedule and ensure that regular maintenance is resumed to prevent this issue from recurring.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kings Hall Road, Penge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Forest Hire Bikes obstructing pavement and access to car park, 8th August
item.description:
